00036 #include "IsolatedLabelledCellKiller.hpp"
00037 #include "VertexBasedCellPopulation.hpp"
00038 #include "CellLabel.hpp"
00039 
00040 template<unsigned DIM>
00041 IsolatedLabelledCellKiller<DIM>::IsolatedLabelledCellKiller(AbstractCellPopulation<DIM>* pCellPopulation)
00042     : AbstractCellKiller<DIM>(pCellPopulation)
00043 {
00044     if (dynamic_cast<VertexBasedCellPopulation<DIM>*>(pCellPopulation) == NULL)
00045     {
00046         EXCEPTION("IsolatedLabelledCellKiller only works with a VertexBasedCellPopulation.");
00047     }
00048 }
00049 
00050 template<unsigned DIM>
00051 void IsolatedLabelledCellKiller<DIM>::CheckAndLabelCellsForApoptosisOrDeath()
00052 {
00053     MutableVertexMesh<DIM, DIM>& vertex_mesh = static_cast<VertexBasedCellPopulation<DIM>*>(this->mpCellPopulation)->rGetMesh();
00054 
00055     unsigned num_labelled_cells = this->mpCellPopulation->GetCellPropertyRegistry()->template Get<CellLabel>()->GetCellCount();
00056 
00057     // If there is more than one labelled cell...
00058     if (num_labelled_cells > 1)
00059     {
00060         // Iterate over cell population
00061         for (typename AbstractCellPopulation<DIM>::Iterator cell_iter = this->mpCellPopulation->Begin();
00062              cell_iter != this->mpCellPopulation->End();
00063              ++cell_iter)
00064         {
00065             // Only consider cells with the CellLabel property
00066             if (cell_iter->template HasCellProperty<CellLabel>())
00067             {
00068                 // Get the element index corresponding to this cell
00069                 unsigned elem_index = this->mpCellPopulation->GetLocationIndexUsingCell(*cell_iter);
00070 
00071                 // Get the set of neighbouring element indices
00072                 std::set<unsigned> neighbouring_elem_indices = vertex_mesh.GetNeighbouringElementIndices(elem_index);
00073 
00074                 // Check if any of the corresponding cells have the CellLabel property...
00075                 unsigned num_labelled_neighbours = 0;
00076                 for (std::set<unsigned>::iterator elem_iter = neighbouring_elem_indices.begin();
00077                      elem_iter != neighbouring_elem_indices.end();
00078                      ++elem_iter)
00079                 {
00080                     if (this->mpCellPopulation->GetCellUsingLocationIndex(*elem_iter)->template HasCellProperty<CellLabel>())
00081                     {
00082                         num_labelled_neighbours++;
00083                     }
00084                 }
00085 
00086                 // ...and if none do, then kill this cell
00087                 if (num_labelled_neighbours == 0)
00088                 {
00089                     cell_iter->Kill();
00090                 }
00091             }
00092         }
00093     }
00094 }
00095 
00096 template<unsigned DIM>
00097 void IsolatedLabelledCellKiller<DIM>::OutputCellKillerParameters(out_stream& rParamsFile)
00098 {
00099     // There are no member variables, so just call method on direct parent class
00100     AbstractCellKiller<DIM>::OutputCellKillerParameters(rParamsFile);
00101 }

00108 template class IsolatedLabelledCellKiller<2>;
00109 template class IsolatedLabelledCellKiller<3>;
